item.title: Free Image Search - Search for free images on multiple sites
item.description: Free Image Search is a meta search engine for free images hosted on sites such as Flickr, Openclipart, Pixabay and Wikimedia Commons.

item.title: Shirt Search - Search for Popular T-Shirts in Multiple Shops
item.description: Search for best-selling and top-rated t-shirts in online shops such as Amazon, Redbubble, Teepublic and Zazzle.

item.title: Magic Numbers Shirt Generator
item.description: Pick a magic hexspeak number to print it on a shirt for computer programmers and geeks.

item.title: Shirt Color Helper for Amazon Merch, Redbubble and Zazzle
item.description: The Shirt Color Helper is a tool to help choosing colors when you create t-shirt designs for Amazon Merch, Redbubble and Zazzle.

item.title: A Bookmarklet to Replace Force(s) with Horse(s) based on xkcd 1418
item.description: This bookmarklet replaces the words force with horse and forces with horses to make sad news a bit more fun based on xkcd 1418.

item.title: Bookmarklet to make reading news more fun xkcd style
item.description: This bookmarklet replaces certain pieces of text on Web pages with other texts that supposedly make reading them more fun. Based on xkcd 1288.

item.title: Introducing b2tob3: Easier Migration to Bootstrap 3
item.description: b2tob3 is a command line tool to help migrate Web projects from bootstrap 2 to bootstrap 3 by performing a set of replacements that reflect bootstrap 3 class name changes.

item.title: YAML Markdown Page Summary Bookmarklet
item.description: YAML Markdown Page Summary is a browser bookmarklet that creates a summary of the currently viewed page for use with static site generators.

item.title: Leetspeak Shirt Generator
item.description: Enter text to translate into leetspeak and get it printed on a t-shirt.

item.title: Born at Unix Time: Get Your Birthday Shirt
item.description: Enter the date and time of your birth to get a t-shirt with the Unix time stamp of your birth printed on it.
